tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE supplier_performance_metrics (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name TEXT,
    delivery_performance FLOAT,
    quality_performance FLOAT,
    reliability_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    supplier_id INT,
    price FLOAT,
    quantity_in_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    order_quantity INT,
    order_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplierContacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deliveries (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    delivery_id INT,
    reliability_score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    fulfillment_score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    negotiation_score DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES deliveries(delivery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    delivery_id INT,
    contract_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (delivery_id) REFERENCES deliveries(delivery_id)
);
